'''Seagrass''' is a [[feature]] that places a large cluster of [[seagrass]] in various underwater [[biome]]s.

== Generation ==
{{Incomplete section|Technical generation details}}
Seagrass features generate on most [[ocean]] floors. They appear in a pseudo-circular pattern and heavily overlap with other clusters in a way that creates large blankets of seagrass. They are composed of [[seagrass]] and [[Seagrass#Tall Seagrass|tall seagrass]]. The percentage of tall seagrass in the feature is determined by <code>percentage</code> value in the [[#Config|configured feature]].
